title: Sbagliato
directions: Pour 4 ounces dry Prosecco or other sparkling white wine into an ice-filled large wine or rocks glass. Add 1 ounce sweet vermouth and 1/2 ounce Campari and top off with club soda. Gently stir together; garnish with a lime wheel.
ingredients: 4 ounces dry Prosecco or other sparkling white wine
